line_2: In smoaky ruins sunk they lie,

line_1: The Devils, said I, are dull in Cruelty.
line_2: Curst of all Creatures, for compar'd with thee,
For, oh he's kind! he's kind! to all but me.

line_1: Not instant victims of her cruelty;
line_2: Misjudging here, by Folly's law we die,
Who beauteous Selima expos'd can see
And shall subdue it ere this age glide by.
